about_the_game:
WARBOUND combines strategic deckbuilding with epic kingdom conquest, delivering a captivating RTS experience. Build your base, assemble your battle deck, and lead powerful armies to conquer rival kingdoms in dynamic, real-time warfare. With every decision, the fate of your kingdom rests in your hands.

Features:


Dynamic Deck Building: Collect and craft your ultimate deck with powerful army and potion cards. Choose your cards carefully—each battle is a test of your strategy and skill.



Epic Kingdom Conquest: Invade rival kingdoms across varied landscapes. Strategize your approach, deploy your King, and crush your enemies in intense real-time battles.



Diverse Battle Cards: Unlock a wide range of army and spell cards, from swordsmen to dragons, fireballs to cyclones. Every card brings unique strengths to your deck.



Real-Time Base Building: Expand your kingdom by constructing vital buildings that generate resources and offer defense. Balance your economy while preparing for relentless invasions.




WARBOUND will keep you on your toes as you face fierce rivals and rise to supremacy. Will you lead your kingdom to glory, or will your enemies bring you to ruin?
